scripts.umd-reporter: npx umd --commonJS SkillsReporter dist/SkillsReporter.js dist/SkillsReporter.umd.js && rm dist/SkillsReporter.js
scripts.umd-display: npx umd --commonJS SkillsDisplayJS dist/SkillsDisplayJS.js dist/SkillsDisplayJS.umd.js && rm dist/SkillsDisplayJS.js
scripts.umd: npm run umd-reporter && npm run umd-display
scripts.build: npm run test && npm run clean && npm run lint && npm run babel && npm run umd && npm rm dist/SkillsDisplayJS.js && npm rm dist/SkillsReporter.js && npx uglifyjs dist/SkillsDisplayJS.umd.js -c -m -o dist/SkillsDisplayJS.umd.min.js && npx uglifyjs dist/SkillsReporter.umd.js -c -m -o dist/SkillsReporter.umd.min.js
